content.detailedDescription:
On june 15, 2010 at approximately 8:56 pm, local time. my wife and i were in our vehicle traveling southbound on sr 347 (maricopa hwy), between riggs and casa blanca roads. we were driving back home in maricopa

i observed two orange lights turning on and off. they were in the southern sky at approximately 30 degrees in the sky. the lights turned on very bright for a second. then they would dim out, and repeat. they did this three times and then completely disappeared. they lights were at least 3 times the size of venus. approximately 5 seconds later, my wife spotted two lights appear to our right, southwest in the direction of mobile. the lights were very bright and moving slowly, south along the palo verde mountains. they appeared to be the same lights we had just seen. both lights went behind the palo verde mountains. even though we could not see the lights we could see the orange glow over the mountain, as if there was a fire on the other side. then the glow faded away. 

me and my wife looked at each other and tried to figure out what we had just seen. we know it was not an airplane, or a flare. i have served in the military and have seen illumination flares, and this was not one. i was not a shooting star, or an airplane. and it was not a planet or star. we could not figure out a reasonable explanation.
content.summary: Orange lights in sky (maricopa, az).

content.detailedDescription:
On a way back home , i've stopped into a gallery & had a chat with the artist , than i asked if we could continue conversation on the outside (no other visitors were present at the time), my pretext was to have a smoke , but the truth is different & couldn't tell him at that time yet. once we were outside by the back door , i took a camera & pointed it in the sky in the north to ne direction , at that moment he said "there's nothing there" , without looking at him i said "if you look you'll see them" , he seemed puzzled , but i took 2 photos of that area than 1 in the direction of es. the first photo was taken at 1:11:21 pm , & although i didn't see anything , some strange 'structure' was visible , especially when brought out close & on full screen ! at first i thought it maybe shadows in the cloud creating such phenomena , but while in the full screen mode , i noticed 'ridges' on it plus above on the right side seem to be pointy triangular shapes. but the most outstanding is what looks like a 'vapor' coming-outgoing out of the middle of it ! the angle position is directed towards the lake . ( i'm aware our celestial co-brothers need of hydrogen as one of the elements to power the ships , but this wasn't even above the water ! the lake is approx. 2 miles ? from where this thing was ).  also , the hot sun rays are consitant of illuminating this 'structure' in the sky .  while i continued going through that 1st photo tiny frame by frame , there's way at the bottom of the photo & nearly directly below of this structure something else , although i cannot make out if it is an ufo ship or something entirely different .  prior to taking these photographs we both saw a sm. aircraft fly by clearly visible with motor noise a at much lower altitude .  i'm attaching 3 photos . a close up of this strange shaped structure , the original photo & zoomed ufo perhaps .
couple hrs later i took additional photos of the sky in another direction with interesting domed disks shining near the sun , but unable to attach these here with the report .
needless to say i'm really puzzled & wondering in regard of this 1 st photo i took .
any ideas ?
content.summary: I wonder what mufon investigators think about this "structure" in the cloud?!

content.detailedDescription: My six yr. old son and i went out to walk dog around 9:20.  we went to our cul de sac and watched the stars because we've been seeing strange things in the sky lately (such as 4 wks. ago in broad daylight when he said ?Look mommy, a rocket? and i looked up to see a dark gray object speeding overhead, an object that was definitely like a rocket, but had no wings, no tail and sped horizontally overhead until it passed over the trees).  so we start walking out of the culdesac towards home and we noticed a very bright low light in the sky.  i pointed it out to my son and urged him to hurry so we could pass the streetlight for a better look.  it looked like the biggest lowest brightest closest star i had ever seen.  it just sat there stationary and bright enough to shine through the tops of pine trees that we passed.  upon reaching our driveway, i told my 6 yr. old to run in and get daddy fast.  i continued watching and my 11 yr. old walked out.  cannot complete description ps3 won't let me type more please email
content.summary: Bright white circular object hovering stationary and twinkling below clouds.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on i-25 toward the hwy 119 exit. i noticed a small ball of light pulsing on and off in the sky near a cloud in front of me. it slowly began to travel west, continuing to pulse on and off. i firt thought it my have been light reflecting off of a plane. after approximately two minutes it stopped moving, pulsed off, and did not return. it had no contrail, and started moving from a dead stop.
     i was shocked by what i saw, and tried to film it with my phone camera. it is visable, but i only hve 30sec of recording time. during the video it is stationary(pulsing on and off)in a cloud in the lower right hand side of the screen.
content.summary: Pulsing ball of white light traveling west.

content.detailedDescription: I thought it was an aircraft at first with flashing navigation lights but upon further examination it appeared as though it firing some sort of thrusters.  there was absolutely no noise coming from it.  it was flying, i'd say, at 3-4000 agl at aprox. 2-300mph.  it continued a northern tragectory until it left our line of sight.  i was standing on our back deck at the time.  it faces the south.
content.summary: Flying due north from the south.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to let the dog go potty. 2:30 am and i sat down in a chair and was gazing up at the sky like i usually do. i saw my first u.F.O. wow!!! it was low on the horizon and i could gage the movements by the neighbors garage roof line. it seemed to just be scanning and moving around slowly.It was very far away and appeared small like the size of a star when looking up at the night sky. it appeared to glow and pulsate with light. i kept moving my chair every 5 minutes to the left about 4=5 feet at a time. i watched for about 20 minutes and then went in. i was hoping for it to take off fast like i see on videos and read about. it was not as exciting as i thought it would be. i wonder if it was us or them? j
content.summary: Glowing pulsing starlike object far off on the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Upon entering my back yard which faces the headwaters of the east fork of the arkansas river outside of leadville, colorado, i noticed that venus seemed to be a bit bright. then this object began to move around. i got my video camera and filmed it for 5 minutes. the object is circular with a ring of light around the bottom. it is pulsing rapidly through all the colors of the rainbow. during the 5 minutes that i was filming it it did not move except at the end of the film when it drops behind the ridge pos back up and dips below the ridge again.  thus and movement in the film is from me adjusting the tripod, or zooming in and out. the object did move quite a lot, just not while i was filming. enjoy the video for it is very real.  i used to say "i want to believe" now i believe but "i want to understand" !!
content.summary: Colored bright disc over marsh behind my home!!

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, my son adn i were driving home from my parents house on cabot road. my parents live about 5 miles away from our home. as we were about to turn left on paseo , i looked up in the sky adn noticed a disk flying with rotating lights...We have a lot of helicopters that fly over our house so i pointed it out to my husband, thinking "this doesn't look anything like a plane or helicopter" . he looked up and saw it and agreed that this was something he's never seen before. my son saw it too, but we donw played it to him, because we could tell it frightened him. we tried to follow it as it was actually in the sky on our way home to our house, but it disapeared behind some trees and we didnt see it again. i tried to capture it with my camera but you can not see anything on the video...Too dark and too far away. while trying to find out if anyone had seen this object last night...I came across this utube video...This is what we saw: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=u4d1osmei9g&feature=player_embedded

some people have comented that this video is a blimp with rolling letters....I wish it was that easy to explain away, but what i saw had symetrical round lights roatating around a disc shaped object.
content.summary: Driving home from parents house with my husband and son.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting in my vehicle this morning around 4:53 from my car clock which might be off a few mins, i leave that time most every morning to go to work, when i looked up in a mostly clear sky and what i thought was a star was dim then got real bright and then just dissappeared . i didnt see any clouds around it , and it seems to like just turn after getting brighter and was gone. not sure what it was really just thought it was kinda strange as i have never seen a star do that before .
content.summary: Star like.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter was driving and i was sitting in the front seat of the car headed toward iowa city.  close to newton...I think east of town and she thinks west of town.....She noticed first something shiney up in the air.  as i was looking for it, it came over the front of the car and then down the side of the hill.  it was the size of about 12" shiny and swirling ball.

we have no idea what it was or if anyone on the road saw it.  there was a lot of traffic as this was the saturday before the iowa corn 250 in newton.

what i saw was a shiny sphere about 12" round just turning and turning like the earth does.  really weird!
content.summary: About 12" diameter sphere swirling over the interstate and then into the woods.

content.detailedDescription:
Estimated-time: 01:45am, estimated-date: october 17, 2009, length: 7-10ft, width: 2-3ft, color: faded bluish florescent,  altitude: 40-50ft facing north,  movement: rotating clockwise, speed: 3-5 mph traveling to the east, weather: clear no wind or breeze.  
i had trouble sleeping the night of my sighting, so i decided to go outside and water the back lawn. i stepped out in the back patio and reached down to pick-up the water hose when i came back up i saw what at the moment i thought was a kite. i immediately concluded that the object was not a kite because it stopped moving but continued to rotate clock-wise. i stood and stared at the object to study its form, color, & shape. this was the (most obscure object) i have ever seen��� i also noticed that this object made absolutely no noise, and the most interesting aspect about it is its shape.  the object looked like a vertebrae or back bone and has it rotated it seemed to be flexing in a cumbersome motion. the color was a faded florescent blue, and the light that it emitted was even throughout the entire shape and form of the object. the size could have been 7-10 ft long and 2-3ft in diameter. the distance was about 40-50ft above me and facing north towards the hollywood hills. i wanted to go get my camera that was sitting on my desk so i backed away from the object to my back door keeping my eyes on it so i don���t lose track of its position. i ran to my desk grabbed my camera and ran back out to my patio. the object was no-longer in its previous position, it had climbed vertically straight up at what i estimated to be 1-2 thousand ft. i turned off the lcd display on my camera to see if i can acquire it through the view finder. i could not see the object, but i snapped 4 succession pictures in the general direction of the object. i could still observe the object with the naked eye but could not see it through the camera. i continued to watch the object for about another minute ��� then it passed out of view completely. i then placed a call to the (lapd) to file a report. the officer who handled the call listened intently and asked me 1 or 2 questions, and then offered to send out a chopper that was in the area to see if they could intercept the object. i said go ahead but that i could not see the object anymore so it would be impossible for me to give any position of where it might be at that moment. the officer thanked me for calling and said that it was an interesting conversation and that if the object returns to call again immediately. i then called (mufon) but got no answer. after that night i had tried to make sense of what i had seen that night and the only explanation i can come up with is that it could (not) have been anything explained in conventional terms and it seemed to be under intelligent control because it stopped in mid-air almost at the exact moment i took notice of the object. it was like the object was watching me has i was watching the object. and when i returned outside this thing had traveled straight up vertically 1-2 thousand ft, from the point and position from where i left it to grab my camera. this was truly the most strangest sighting i have ever experienced��� i have had an abduction experience when i was 6 years old, and throughout my life i have had ufo sighting of all different types, but nothing like the 1 i had this night. estimated-time: 01:45am, estimated-date: october 17, 2009, length: 7-10ft, width: 2-3ft, color: faded bluish florescent,  altitude: 40-50ft facing north,  movement: rotating clockwise, speed: 3-5 mph traveling to the east, weather: clear no wind or breeze.

the object looked like a vertebrae or back bone and has it rotated it seemed to be flexing in a cumbersome motion. the color was a faded florescent blue, and the light that it emitted was even throughout the entire shape and form of the object. the size could have been 7-10 ft long and 2-3ft in diameter. the distance was about 40-50ft above me and facing north towards the hollywood hills. i my camera to see if i can acquire it through the view finder. i could not see the object, but i snapped 4 succession pictures in the general direction of the object. i could still observe the object file a report. the officer who handled the call listened intently and asked me 1 or 2 questions, and then offered to send out a chopper that was in the area to see if they could intercept the object. i said go ahead but that i could not see the object anymore so it would be impossible for me to give any position of where it might be at that moment. the officer thanked me for calling and said that it was an interesting conversation and that if the object returns to call again immediately. i then called (mufon) but got no answer. after that night i had tried to make sense of what i had seen that night and the only explanation i can come up with is that it could (not) have been anything explained in conventional terms and it seemed to be under intelligent control because it stopped in mid-air almost at the exact moment i took notice of the object. it was like the object was watching me has i was watching the object. and when i returned outside this thing had traveled straight up vertically 1-2 thousand ft, from the point and position from where i left it to grab my camera. this was truly the most strangest sighting i have ever experienced��� i have had an abduction experience when i was 6 years old, and throughout my life i have had ufo sighting of all different types, but nothing like the 1 i had this night. i did a little research into this object and there was some video on youtube pertaining to a sighting that story musgrave the astronaut had videotaped from the space shuttle. here the youtube video link that will give some idea to what i witnessed: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=jotdaxx1w2a
the object i saw moved in the exact same way has the video clip of the story musgrave sightings. its form or shape hard to determine whether it���s the same object. but its movement is identical to my sighting. this sends chills up my spine when i think about it. i keep asking myself what could it have been???
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying serpent!!!

content.detailedDescription:
this was an unusual encounter unlike any that most people describe. for the 13 years that followed, i assumed it was just a bad dream, that was until my mother described having had witnessed something exactly identical that had also occurred to her 13 years prior, in the same location but on a different night.
  one evening in 1977, in a small apartment building in hanna city, illinois, i as a 5 yr old child, had been awoken to something that was incomprehensible and terrifying. this particular night, i went into my mother���s bed to sleep which was not routine for me. 
  sometime during the night, i was awoken by a strange cylindrical, machine-like object. it was approximately the size of a coffee can, maybe a little bigger. it hovered 3 to 4 inches off the floor and spun silently as it moved around the bedroom. there was a slight glow around this object and it seemed to almost have intelligence about it.
  how it got into the building, i don���t know. i was positioned on the right side of my mother���s queen-sized bed, and she was asleep on the left. she never awoke during my witnessing of this object. i first noticed it as it entered through the bedroom door on the right hand side of the room. it was metallic and appeared to have sharp edges. after it made its entrance into the bedroom, it hovered in front of the foot of the bed going right to left. i could see its glow cast just below the foot before it had emerged into sight. it then proceeded to come back and make a turn around the right front portion of the bed and slowly approached me along the right side of the bed still hovering/spinning approximately 3-4 inches off the floor. as it made its way to just below where i was sitting watching it, it ascended up to my level.
  at this point i was paralyzed with terror, i could not scream or move. i lost all consciousness and never had another experience like it again. i have no memory of what occurred after that, what it was, or why it was there.
  13 years later, when i was 18, the experience came up in conversation between mom and i somehow, and i learned it was not just a dream. she had the exact, identical experience, same description, and same outcome as i did. since then, we have been completely at a loss for an explanation of what it was. we have been trying to find other���s with the same experience/sighting. i have a feeling it may have been some type of alien drone or probe, for it wasn���t much like a ghost or apparition. i have read about hundreds of e.T. and ufo sightings, but nothing is described to like what my mother and i witnessed. 
    i have had only one actual, ���typical��� ufo sighting since that thing in the bedroom.  in february, 1994, at  ft.  leonardwood, mo.  between the hours of 10:00 & 11:00, on a clear day, there was a silver, diamond-shaped ufo in the sky moving in all sorts of sharp angular directions, and traveling from one end of the sky to the other in just fractions of a second, which must have been at least 200 miles ground distance. i had no other witnesses, but i was fully coherent and aware of what i was witnessing. it was visible for maybe about a minute, and it took off and disappeared from sight.
  i have no question about the ufo sighting in missouri, for it seems to be like one of thousands of accounts. but nothing compares to the mechanical-cylindrical object that both my mother and i witnessed on different occasions without knowledge of each other���s experience of it. i would love to know if anyone has an idea of what it really was, what its purpose was, and why only my mother and i had the experience with it. to this day, i���m baffled but open to any explanation.
content.summary: Tiny ufo probe or drone?

content.detailedDescription:
Saw plane flying in clear blue am sky. in front maybe underneath or to the right of the plane was a smaller object could have been diamond shaped or a disc was flying parallel to plane. the object itself lit up 3 or 4 separate times to a very bright light. seemed to be flying with at first i thought the plane was following the object. soon both objects disapeared over the a tree line.

i was swimming in a pool and happened to look up.
saw airplane flying over head with the cloud trail it leaves
always have been facsinated by flight i guess.
i thought at first, "is the airplane following that object"
but then it looked like the object was just following along with the plane just out of view. the object flew straight with the plane lighting up bright white color like 3 or 4 times before it was out of sight.

just thought to myself, what the heck could that be, and dang that's pretty cool. one of the strangest things i've seen in the sky.

the plane and object were soon out of sight as they passed over a tree line and i lost sight of them. had eyes on for a good 30 seconds, of course in a pool i didn't have my phone handy.
content.summary: Smaller object flying in unison with airplane maybe to the side or underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, sister her husband and i where sitting by the camp fire all facing west.  at 10:50 pm we all saw this intense brilliant (white) light in the western sky, then it appeared to turn to the left, began dimming and headed north.  we lost sight of it a few seconds later.  exactly 10 minutes later the same thing happened again and that was the last time we saw it.  this appears to be just like the report from colorado the same night, posted on this site. this wasn't a landing light from an aircraft and we have no military planes in the area.  the light appeared to be at least as far up as satelites travel.  we thought it could have been the space station, but it happened twice in the same spot.  
what could this have been?  we discussed it for a long time and didn't come to the conclusion that it was a ufo, but who knows.  the moon was a little more than half and this light was much more brilliant than the moon and about 1/8 the size, so it was very large.

any ideas, let me know
content.summary: Intense bright light.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my father driving west on highway 190 (florida blvd.) headed towards walker, la on our way to walmart in the early evening. i looked up in the sky. it wasn't a perfectly clear blue sky , there were thin layers of a few clouds. i saw some sort of star-like object in the sky about north west of us maybe somewhere in northern la. since i was in a car, i couldn't tell if it was moving or not , but i knew it wasn't a star. it seemed to be like a really bright light but very far off . not anywhere near us but it couldn't be an airplane or helicopter . i saw this once before when i was driving on the same road and about the same strip of highway except the object was in a different area of the sky. this time , my father saw it too and he thought it might be a star also but he too is a strong believer in outside life . i watched it for a few seconds before it disappeared behind some clouds . i kept my eyes open looking to see it would appear anywhere else but it didn't . i didn't get a really good look at it , but i know that it was really strange considering i saw this beofore a few months back in the same place . i'm not exactly sure what it was , but i'm leaning towards it being a ufo . and since that only means unidentified flying object, then it had to have been . maybe it was just the reflection of light that caused this weird encounter. i'm not sure , i'm just here to report it . thanks
content.summary: Star-like object far away in daylight sky - not an air craft.

content.detailedDescription: My 11 year old grandson was spending the day with me and we were resting on a bench, i relaxed back looked up and i saw a circular shape flying by a plane! i just started screaming for my son who is 27 years old, daniel ufo hurry, i was running to his camper, he and his 19 year old stepson came outside. we were all in shock as we watched this!We watched as 2 more planes crossed going right by this other plane and ufo. i didn't notice any responce by any of the planes, when they all had to see this circular object!! my 11 year old grandson will never be the same! all 4 of us have changed our way of thinking!The thing was traveling south to north!! this was very wierd but i felt like it new we saw it! i went on youtube to see if anyone else saw it. i saw where others have seen them by planes! look up friends!
content.summary: Ufo flying by large plane.

content.detailedDescription: Someone launched a flying lantern last night 6/20/2010 over plymouth, pa. it picked up good wind and looked like a shooting star. further investigation proved to be only a flying chinese lantern / wishing lantern in good winds.
content.summary: Small circular shape, looking like fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 8:40, i was packing up the car, in the driveway, in canton mi, i looked up towards the moon to the south and saw 4 white spheres making a shape similar to the "dipper" part of the big dipper.. in fact, thats what i instictivly thought it was, but it wasnt dark yet, there were no clouds in that part of the  sky, no other stars could be seen in any direction, the sky was blue and clear and the moon 3/4 full and crystal clear.. as i stared i tried to figure out what these "stars" were, i realized they were in motion! and moving fast to the east and up towards the direction of the moon. i was stunned.  these things were twice the size of what venus looks like in the night sky, but they werent glowing, there was no contrail like a jet, and they werent staying in the 'dipper" formation.. so i looked to the far west and saw a jet high in the sky leaving a signature contrail, i looked to the far east and could see a low flying jet comming into detroit metro.. so it was obvious to me these were not planes, and the objects were far away.. 
 
the freakiest thing of all was what was happening around the 2 "lower" objects.. there were 3-4 black objects, about 2% of the size of the white objects, engaged with the white ones!! it looked as if the black ones were in some sort of "dog-fight" type of movement.. at times the black ones would be forming a straight-line formation and then break apart and swarm the white, moving back and forth across its path...Fast.. diving and circling around the white ones, aggressively.. 
 
it was sureal.., i yelled to my family standing by the doorway to come watch, and even they were like, *(acronym deleted--sgonzalez/cms) is that!! this all happened for about 45sec-1min, and then all the objects faded up and out toward the direction of the moon.. 

i really had the feeling that i was watching something that wasn't "natural" in a biological sense.. the motion of these objects seemed very mechanical and fast! really fast! especially the black objects.. and like i said, these objects were not moving down towards the earth, they were moving away and up towards the moon!
content.summary: 4 white spheres moving south and upward towards the moon, engaged with 6-8 smaller black objects moving in same direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car traveling east on 2100 south.  i looked up and saw a small silver/white object to the east traveling west directly toward me. i thought it might be a plane, then it stopped. i pointed it out to my wife and children.  i was very curious about it since it just stopped.  it was almost directly above us.  it was quite high and difficult to determine its size.  i did not have a camera or binoculars. we watched it for a few minutes from the car.  we kept driving on and it stayed stationary.  it may have been a mylar balloon, however, it moved very briskly and steadily then stopped.  we all agreed it was very odd.  it was perfect day with ideal visability.  would like to know if anyone else observed this, directly over slc at around noon.
content.summary: Mid-day silver object in a perfect blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: In total there were three of us. we were just west of calgary, alberta camping in a private area along the elbow river. the walk to the river was ten to fifteen minutes from where we set up camp. around 2am we decided to go for a walk to the river so we grabbed head lamps, a lantern and my friend's dog and headed towards the river. the walk from the camp to the river is spent walking through trees and thick brush 95% of the way to the river.  the sky was unbelievable clear that night and we could see so many stars from horizon to horizon. once clear of the brush we had a huge view of the sky. we noticed many satellites overhead and discussed trying to find out when the space station was flying overhead that night. the river had about 2 meters of fog on top of it and it was quite cool outside. the dog was not acting strange in any way, he seemed content to take a step or two into the river and then continue to meander around. all three of us were looking towards the sky but in slightly different directions, enough to cover at least 65% of the visible sky. it was very quiet when a pulse of light, the like of which i have never seen appeared to encompass us. it was quiet bizarre. it was as if there were an epicenter (like when you drop a pebble in a pond) right above us. the light wave moved away from the epicenter in all direction, 360 degrees. it was white and very intense. it was very strange because of the visible physical properties of it. it made it look as though the entire atmosphere was moved like a wave through water and it definitely had a 3d look to it. i currently study the properties of light in physics and radiology which made it clear to me immediately, that because of the 3d wave like nature of this event that it was some kind of strange occurrence or anomaly. the part i want to stress the most is the 3d water wave like nature of this light and the fact that it was directly over our heads. we felt odd after the pulse happened and when we returned to the camp we all felt a little different. from this point on we stayed in and around the camp for the night and around 10am we returned to the river to recover the dogs leash. we sat around for a bit but all three of us felt odd and we returned to the camp and relaxed in the sun for the afternoon. at no point do any of us recall seeing an object that could be distinguished from a satellite, and we only saw one plane fly overhead but it was before the pulse and it was very clearly an international flight heading away from calgary. no noises were heard at any point before, during or immediately after the pulse.  that is about all i can think of at this time. thanks for taking the
content.summary: Strange pulse of light.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a windless and clear evening.  my daughter was on the back deck with her boyfriend and she frantically called me to come outside.  there was a large bright, glowing orange orb was floating in the air below our neighbours tree line (<40 feet high). it was large - nabout 3 feet in diameter. 

at first i thought it was fireworks debris but there were no ashes trailing from it. i was worried that it was going to crash into one of the houses behind us and start a fire,  i was going to call the fire dept. but after observing it for a while - it was obviously moving on its own  - it didn't move the way you would expect burning debris to move.   

then i thought it was a chinese lantern on fire, but this was very close - approx. 50 feet away and was no lantern. it was not open at the bottom.  it was not perfectly round either, it was like a ball of orange gas with an irregular surface - i could see small flames all over the surface. it was totally silent. when my husband and i came out and saw it - it was traveling eastwards very slowly and at a slight downwards motion, but my daughter thinks it came down from the sky as it was descending when she first spotted it.  this would explain why more people didn't report it.

it "floated" for about 7 seconds (traveling about 50 ft) then it turned (about 200 degrees) to clear the large group of trees (i.E. to go around the trees).  when it got to the back of the neighbours yard it took off in a straight line at a greater speed (30 mph?) in between 2 houses.  we knew we couldn't follow it as it was going too fast now.  it was definitely burning some kind of fuel but what gas burns this tangerine orange colour? 

this was seen in a very densely populated urban neighbourhood.  i think it may be some experiment in alternative energy (fuels).  but i have no idea what it was.  apparently lots of people are seeing these orange orbs but no one knows what they are.

we didn't get photos, too bad because we were closer than any other sighting i read about on the web.  my daughters cell phone camera was right beside her and her boyfriend told her to take a picture but we were all too freaked out to take our eyes off of it.

feelings or reactions?  i felt that i was witnessing a secret experiment.  we are close to lake ontario with a us military base across the lake.
i also think that maybe others reported this to the police or fire depts. but i don't have access to that information.
content.summary: Flaming orange orb witnessed by 4 people less than 50 feet away in full daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
An orange sphere appeared , approx.  6000 meters altitude , speed about approx . 350 kilometers an hour . it flew in a constant line , very slow . no positioning lights or blinking lights , a constant orange glow . 
3 other people saw it , too . we were sitting outside , no lights , except a candle, so we could see the sky very clear . no clouds were there .
the object flew from left to right , and suddenly disappeared in about quarter of a second . between two trees , just disappeared . no clouds !
personal reactions : a very stramge feeling,  not quite normal . cannot describe it very exactly !
content.summary: Orange sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
During the lunch hour, i saw a black cylinder in the sky about a mile away and about 1,500ft up.  it was a tube-shaped object with rounded ends.  studying it for about a minute through binoculars, i was sure it was not a helicopter or aircraft.  it lacked wings, propellers, engines, lights, landing gear, windows, and it had no insignias.  at no time did i hear sound from it.  the object flew under power, but the source of it was not apparent.  the wind had no apparent effect on it.  i estimated the size at around 6 feet in diameter and up to 18 feet long.

it changed compass directions with smooth on-axis turns.  it rotated flat as if a pin was stuck down through its mid point.  for the first turn it slowed and rotated about 45deg, pointing one of its ends in my direction and then flew straight toward my position.  the second on-axis turn occurred when it was about 1/4 mile away from me.  as part of that maneuver, one end rose upwards to about 60deg.  the tube then flew as if following an upwardly diagonal straight line; it went toward a spot on the 2,200ft base of a thick overcast.  

while watching with binoculars the tube suddenly changed shape and became a black rectangular sheet with slightly ragged edges.  now instead of a tube, there appeared something in the shape of a quite large sheet of plywood, painted black, roughly 8ft x 16ft.   

as if nothing had happened, the flying sheet kept the tube���s 60-degree tilt and silently continued along the same diagonal path.  as it went the sheet slowly rocked side to side, perhaps 10 degrees each side; it was as if a spindle shaft went through the middle of it on the long dimension.  the timing of the rocking movements did not seem to vary.  at this point, by ground distance the object was roughly 1/2 mile away or a bit more.

a patch of blue sky had appeared a few thousand feet above the flying sheet, actually at the 6,600ft roof of the overcast.  still tilted and rocking, the sheet transitioned from its diagonal path to a 90deg straight-up climb toward the blue.  a last look through the binoculars before the clouds closed over showed a pinpoint quite high in the open sky and moving straight away.  

the sighting lasted around 5 minutes.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Daytime - dark tubular object, shape shift.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11pm. june 16, 2010 i went out to my front porch to smoke a cigarette before going to bed. my front porch faces due west. the evening was clear and my view of the sky was good, for living in a city. about 3 minutes into my cigarette, chair kicked back up against a wall facing the western sky, i happened to notice a very slow moving, small pinpoint light (it looked like a dim bluish star) coming towards me from the southwest, heading northeast. the object appeared to be at a very high altitude, had no flashing navigation lights and maintained the same, stable luminosity (no flashing or twinkling) for the first 15 seconds of observation.

i first thought the object was a satellite, (i have observed satellites in the past) and this is why i continued to watch it. after observing the object travel for the first 15 seconds it suddenly grew much brighter, about as bright as venus. (i had observed venus earlier in the evening). the object continued moving at the same speed and direction. 

at this point in time, i knew the object was not a satellite, and thought it might be a jet of some sort, that had just turned on its landing lights. even though dia & buckley afb are nearby to the east, i thought this was unusual due to the extremely high altitude, extremely slow speed, and lack of any other navigation lights.

the now very bright object continued traveling in the same direction for another 15 seconds and then stopped moving. 

in the last 5 seconds of observing the object, it did not move and quickly grew much brighter, approximately 3 times brighter than venus. the object then vanished in a flash of bright light. (bright enough to burn the image into my eyes for a few seconds) after a few blinks, my eyes recovered from the flash and i could make out a short, faint, white, hazy, luminescent trail going due north from where the object had stood. 

i do understand the object may have been traveling at a high speed, but due to its high altitude and my perspective, appeared to me, to be moving slowly.

two days later, on the evening of june 18, 2010 at approximately 10:45pm. under the same circumstances as june 16, i'm out on my front porch under clear skies, smoking another cigarette, kicked back in my chair facing the sky, directly due west, when a brilliant white oval object appeared to just "pop" into view. the object had a very distinct, solid white oval shape to it. the object stood still for about 1 1/2 seconds and then quickly moved to the north at a high rate of speed. this object appeared to be at a much lower altitude than the object i had observed two days prior on 6/16. the object continued to move north for about 15 seconds and then vanished.  during flight, the object maintained a consistent luminosity, it did not flash or twinkle, there were no navigation lights. 

i have lived at this residence for 10 years. i am familiar with the routine air traffic over my home. (commercial, civilian and military). in both sightings, the objects did not appear to be any type of aircraft that i am familiar with.

i am 42 years old, and throughout my life, i have observed many individual meteors, spent many evenings watching meteor showers, and have witnessed a few spectacular fireballs. in both sightings, the objects did not appear to be meteors.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Objects over denver june 16 & 18, 2010.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, a family friend and my 6 year old nephew and i were heading home going westbound in anaheim ca. i noticed a row of bright light hovering over a park. i was shocked at the possibility this could be a ufo. i quickly told my wife and our friend to look up at the lights in the sky. it was a clear sky, we pulled over next to the hovering object about 100-150 ft away from it. we noticed this object was huge in size about 50-100 ft wide disk shaped and it had a ring of lights on the side of the craft with a red light in the middle of the ring of lights. it started moving northwest and the ring of lights started flickering one light after the other. we followed it for about 5 min trying to take pictures of it but our cellphone cameras were not good enough to take pictures. my 6 year old nephew started freaking out because he did not know what it was. all of the sudden the disk shaped object was gone. making no sound just disappeared. looking at the web we found a video filmed about a year ago 50 miles away from where we live. in this video this is the exact same thing we saw. sadly we could not take pictures or video.
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=u4d1osmei9g&feature=player_embedded
content.summary: Disc shaped object hovering over willow park.

content.detailedDescription: At 2100 hrs. a paid observerver noticed in northwest sky to bright objects one moved left going west and, stooped and moved again up and around 2nd object no threat to public ct. state were not called no reason or the big boys, if it was a threat protocal would have been exacuted. interesting not ours. a fellow co-worker know for honesty and has good char.... end of report. this is for your records no need to contact me. plese put on internet so others could see and might have noticed incident.
content.summary: A co-worker noticed in northwest sky high alt. a unknown obj. moved west 5 miles then up and around another object..

content.detailedDescription:
My partner (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and i were sitting on the couch at home watching the opening of the series finally of the tudors at 9:05 pm est, when i spotted the first in a series of about 15 orange/red glowing orbs.  during the event several planes had departed miami international airport flying out of the airport from the west to the east.  the first orb quickly passed by us flying in a se to w/nw direction and disappered from site within 5 minutes.  then about 15 minutes later the sky had filled with the same orbs, about 15 in total.  the drifted to the south of us for about 10 minutes, then quickly departed in a w/nw direction until they were no longer in view.  we each took several pictures with our iphones, however little detail can be seen in the photos.  

the objects moved slowly and silent passed us and then appeared to increase in speed and quickly disappeared while traveling in a west/north west direction.  the only sounds in the sky were coming from the jetliners departing miami international airport which passed about 2 to 5 miles south and parallel of the ufos.  the ufo's appeared in random groups of one, two's and three's and appeared to be flying at an altitude that matched the jetliners flying out of mia.

we both felt calm, yet excited honored to witness something so beautiful and unique.  

all three images unfortunately show only a bright white ball of light with none of the details that we witnessed in person.  the objects/ufos are the small points of light, each photo show only one object which, in each photo, happens to be the single highest point of light.  the balance of lights are from single story commercial buildings on biscayne blvd/a1a and street lights.
content.summary: Multiple orange-red glowing orbs moving from se and e toward the w nw.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way from scranton to philly to visit our son. it was a sunday, either may 23 or may 30. we were on rt. 476, n.E. turnpike ext. a short distance before getting on the schuylkill express way. as we were descending from high ground (my wife was driving)i caught a glimpse of what appeared to be a balloon (blimp). i say this because the rear end of the craft had thick fins very reminiscent of a blimp  but the front was not. the front had an obvious nipple like protrusion jutting out and the top front had the same protrusion jutting upward 90 degrees to the protrusion at the tip. the body of the craft seemed to taper towards the rear end. it was grayish beige in color and seemed very low to the ground.

 it was impossible for this object not to be seen by numerous people in the area. could anyone from the philly area please tell me what this object was/is? *(wit's email address deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Blimp shaped with obvious protruding tip (nipple) , dome on top front.

content.detailedDescription:
While camping up near geneva park near grant colorado, i got up around 3:30 to go to the bathroom (in the woods). i felt a bit anxious when i woke up. i noticed my brother who i was camping with was feeling a bit on edge too so we both decided to get some fresh air. the milky way was the brightest, most defined i'd ever seen it - it was an amazingly clear, crisp dark night with tons of stars. as i'm looking sw at the galaxy belt i see an intense bright light out the corner of my eye toward the south come out of nowhere. it is brighter and larger than anything in the sky. once i looked directly at it it appeared to be coming down toward me without any horizontal movement. it made no noise and it looked like it would if were a police helicopter shining it's spotlight straight down at you. i remember being stunned by this and wondering what was going to happen next. this lasted for maybe 8 to 10 seconds before the light dissipated to the brightness of a small, dim star. as the light dimmed it began to move nw in the sky as if it were a satellite. i followed it for about 20 seconds before it was no longer visible and faded away into the sky.

i'm not sure what it could have been. i thought that maybe it could have been a satellite catching a very intense reflection of the sun. however, i've never seen or heard of a satellite stopping mid flight and then continuing on again impossible at those speeds. i have seen similar sightings before but this was a bit spookier than the others. weird!
content.summary: Bright flash out of sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was awakened out of a deep sleep to open my eyes and be staring into the face of a very dark looking alien - who seemed to be laying horizontal on my bed facing me. the look & shape of its head & features were the "typical grey" type alien with very large, slanted almond eyes, a tiny mouth & chin, and a very large cranium. the only difference is that it seemed much darker, and as i looked at it, the corners of its mouth turned up in what seemed to be an evil smile. i was so horrified at this site, i could not make a noise. i did not feel that i could even reach out to wake my husband in the bed, as this alien was between my husband and i, and i did not want to touch it. so i closed my eyes and began intensely praying to god. i am a strong believer in god, and this is my natural reaction to any challenging situation, as god is always faithful to take care of my needs. but because of my horror, i could not bring myself to open my eyes again for what seemed like 20 minutes. it could have been shorter, or even longer, i had no way of checking. but i did finally open my eyes and it was gone. i heard and felt no noise, or movement on the bed, even though it seemed to be on top of the mattress. this experience is very real to me even to this day. i know it was something i actually saw, and not just a dream. unfortunately, i do not keep a journal, so i do not know the exact date this happened. i live out in the country, with the closest neighbors a few blocks away. i came across your website for the 1st time today, and thought i would share my experience, as others have done. *deleted wit's initials--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Grey alien encounter...
